column5: I am going for a bear hunt to Lake Manitoba Narrows in early June. Anyone know much about the fishing there? Walleyes, northern Pike, etc. I am going to do some carp bowfishing which should be fun but I would like to find some good fishing too while I am not in the treestand. Thanks for any help....

Yes there is walleye and Northern fishing at Lake Manitoba Narrows. My experience has been that the fishing is better when the weather has been stable-calm for several days. It's shallow and if it's been windy and the lake has been stirred-up the water is silty and the bite is off. My $.02.
